stories.title: When Silence Became the Third Person in the Marriage
stories.subtitle: A story about avoiding hard conversations and learning to repair early.

contentBlocks.text: Start with a relatable scene and the main tension in 2–3 lines.
Describe the trigger and the pattern (avoid blame language).
Introduce the small shift: honesty, apology, prayer, counsel, structure.

items: A faith rhythm in the home

contentBlocks.text: We thought love was enough, but we needed skills too.

keyLessons: Avoiding issues doesn’t remove them — it delays them.
Repair is a skill you can learn.
Small consistent habits change the climate of a home.

reflectionPrompts.text: Where do you tend to avoid hard conversations — and why?
What is one small repair action you can practice within 24 hours of conflict?

actionStep.title: The 10-Minute Repair
actionStep.instructions: Set a 10-minute timer. Share one feeling, one need, and one request. End with a short prayer (optional).
